name: silky-gs
description: A hardware abstraction layer runtime for porting NES games to the Apple IIgs

scripts.build:image: npm run build:smb && npm run build-image.bat %npm_package_config_cadius%
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: npm run build:smb && npm run build:bf
scripts.debug:smb: cd src && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% SuperMarioGS -source SuperMarioGS_S02__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S03__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S04__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S05__Output.txt -map SMB.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:bf: cd src/games/bf && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% BalloonFgtGS -source BalloonFgtGS_S02__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S03__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S04__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S05__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S06__Output.txt -map BF.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer

author: Lucas Scharenbroich
